hero.name: AbdelazizElh Elhathout
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative and performant web solutions. Specialized in developing modern applications with the latest technologies.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer with solid technical expertise

bio.p1: I am AbdelazizElh Elhathout, a Full Stack developer passionate about creating innovative web solutions. With several years of experience in developing modern web applications, I specialize in creating exceptional user experiences.
bio.p2: My expertise covers the entire technology stack, from frontend to backend, including databases and deployment. I am constantly seeking new technologies and best practices to improve my skills.
bio.p3: Currently, I work at Decq Print Maroc as a Full Stack developer, where I contribute to the development of innovative online printing solutions.

projects.title: My projects
projects.subtitle: Discover some of my recent achievements

decq.title: Full-Stack Developer (Decq Print)
decq.description: Industrial production management solution with backend APIs, logistics platform and complete CRUD interfaces.

details.backend: APIs (machine park management, production orchestration, capacity analysis), logistics platform (automated documents, AWS S3 integration)
details.frontend: CRUD interfaces, visual planning, dashboards, orders module (dynamic PDFs)
details.stack: Symfony/Vue.js, REST API, Twig, Docker, AWS, DOMPDF

wobz.title: Full-Stack Developer (WObz Technologie)
wobz.description: E-commerce and financial management solution with Magento 2 integration and complete management workflow.

details.backend: Magento 2 integration (order import, stock sync), Management workflow (orders, S3 files), Financial module (SEPA payments, document generation)
details.stack: Symfony/Vue.js, REST API, Twig, Docker, AWS, RabbitMQ, GoCardless, Magento 2 API

gestion-bureaux.title: Engineering Office Management (ADMDI)
gestion-bureaux.description: Engineering office management system with client/project modules and multi-currency financial management.

details.features: Client/project modules + financial (multi-currency, invoicing), User role management (admin/assistants)

youtrain.title: YouTrain™ Booking (YOUCODE)
youtrain.description: Railway booking platform with complete network management and integrated search engine.

details.features: Complete network management (cities/stations/trains), Search engine and integrated ticketing

holt-forecasting.title: Sales Forecasting App with Holt's Method
holt-forecasting.description: Streamlit application for sales forecasting using Holt's double exponential smoothing method.

details.features: Excel-based product database (EAN codes), 12-month historical data input, Customizable forecast period (1-12 months), CSV export functionality, Responsive design
details.stack: Python, Streamlit, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Excel

portfolio-react.title: Portfolio React 2025
portfolio-react.description: Modern and professional portfolio developed with React, Tailwind CSS and Vite, showcasing my Full Stack development skills.

details.features: Modern responsive design, Dark/light mode, Smooth animations with Framer Motion, Bilingual support (French/English), Interactive carousels, WhatsApp contact form, SEO optimized
details.stack: React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, i18next, Lucide React

nobty-myplace.title: Nobty MyPlace Front SaaS
nobty-myplace.description: Frontend SaaS application for booking appointments with hairdressers and barbers, built with Vue.js.

details.features: Appointment booking system, Appointment management interface, Modern Vue.js architecture, Responsive design, User dashboard, Availability management
details.stack: Vue.js, JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, Modern UI/UX

dartabkh-front.title: DarTabkh Front SaaS
dartabkh-front.description: Frontend SaaS application for food delivery and restaurant management services built with Vue.js.

details.features: Food delivery platform, Restaurant management interface, Order tracking system, Modern Vue.js architecture, Responsive design, User authentication
details.stack: Vue.js, JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, Modern UI/UX

cv-section.title: CV & Documents
cv-section.description: Professional CV in French and English, PDF format optimized for printing and digital sharing.

details.features: Professional design, 40/60 layout, Optimized typography, Smart page breaks, Consistent colors

decq-print.title: Full Stack Developer
decq-print.description: Development of online printing solutions with Laravel and Vue.js. Backend architecture management and performance optimization.

wobz.title: Full Stack Developer
wobz.description: Development of web applications for reusable container customization. Collaboration with the French team.

admdi.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
admdi.description: End-of-studies internship in web development and digital marketing. Creation of custom web applications.

freelance.description: Development of applications and websites for various clients. Complete project management from A to Z.

fstg-recommendation.description: Recommendation letter from Prof. Younes Zouani (Java Spring Boot professor) at Faculty of Sciences and Techniques Gueliz.

sql-intermediate.description: Intermediate SQL certification from HackerRank demonstrating proficiency in complex queries, joins, and database operations.

symfony-basics.title: PHP SYMFONY BASICS
symfony-basics.description: Fundamentals of PHP Symfony framework certification from CodeSignal covering basic concepts and architecture.

symfony-mvc-todo.title: Building a MVC ToDo App with Symfony
symfony-mvc-todo.description: Developed a full-featured ToDo application using Symfony MVC architecture, implementing: task management, user authentication, and responsive interface.

recommendations.title: 📝 Professional Recommendations
recommendations.subtitle: What my colleagues and collaborators say

fouad.name: Fouad Houdda
fouad.text: I confidently recommend AbdelazizElh as a dedicated, competent and highly motivated developer. Throughout our collaboration, he has consistently demonstrated solid technical skills as well as a proactive mindset.

mounir.name: Mounir El Bakkali 🇵🇸
mounir.text: I am pleased to recommend AbdelazizElh, a very competent full stack developer with whom I had the pleasure of working on several projects. He excels in translating client needs into concrete solutions and masters both backend and frontend.

paul.name: Paul Roux
paul.text: I am delighted to recommend AbdelazizElh, with whom I have been working for a year and a half at Decq. He has established himself as a reliable, rigorous and curious professional. He quickly analyzes situations and makes effective decisions. His kindness and enthusiasm make working alongside him very pleasant. I warmly recommend him.

anas.name: Anas Barnouch
anas.position: Master's Student in Big Data & Cloud Computing
anas.text: I had the pleasure of working with AbdelazizElh at YouCode school. He demonstrates seriousness, technical competence and good team spirit. AbdelazizElh is a valuable asset for any development team.

quentin.name: Quentin Dessartine
quentin.text: I collaborated with AbdelazizElh, a full stack developer remarkable for his seriousness, responsiveness and professionalism. He always places client needs at the center of his priorities, anticipates problems, proposes concrete solutions and ensures impeccable code quality. A rare profile that I recommend without hesitation.

nouhaila.name: Nouhaila Gourram
nouhaila.text: AbdelazizElh is a reliable and competent full stack developer. He has a sharp analytical mind, writes clean code and approaches each mission with seriousness. An excellent collaborator with strong potential.
